ARABIC: وَقَٰتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Fight in the Way of Allah. Know that Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Fight in the way of God, and remember that God hears all and knows everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O Muslims, fight in the way of Allah and know that Allah hears everything and knows everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Fight for the cause of God and know that God is All-hearing and All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And fight in Allah's cause and know well that Allah is All Hearing, All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And fight in the way of Allah and know that Allah is All-Hearer, All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And fight in the way of Allah, and know that Allah is Hearing, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So fight in God's way, and know that God is All-hearing, All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Fight in the way of Allah, and know that Allah is Hearer, Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Fight [in defence] in God's cause and remember that He is all hearing and all knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And fight in the way of Allah and know that verily Allah is Hearing, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Fight in the way of Allah, and know that Allah is all-hearing, all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then fight in the cause of Allah, and know that Allah Heareth and knoweth all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And fight in the Way of Allah and know that Allah is All-Hearer, All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Fight in the way of Allah. And know that Allah is the Hearer and the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Fight in the cause of God, and know that God is Hearing and Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fight in the cause of Allah and know that Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:244] So fight in God’s way, in order to elevate His religion, and know that God is Hearing, of your sayings, Knowing, of your affairs, and He will requite you accordingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then said to them after He brought them back to life: (And fight in the way of Allah) in obedience of Allah against your enemies, (and know that Allah is Hearer) of what you say, (Knower) of your intentions and the punishment that is going to visit you if you disobey what you have been commanded to do.
